Column Comment.0: SOFTWARE APPLICATION IDENTIFIER: Unique name or code for the softwareapplication.
Column Comment.1: ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation used for reference type or code.
Column Comment.2: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.3: APPLICATION VERSION: the version of the application that is used, as assigned bythe owner of the application.
Column Comment.4: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.5: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.6: FUNCTION DESCRIPTION: A narrative comment that clarifies the specific use orfunction of this sofware application. Use in conjunction with the validated referencecode.
Column Comment.7: LONG NAME: Common long name given to reference type or code.
Column Comment.8: APPLICATION OWNER BUSIENSS ASSOCIATE: The unique identifier for thebusiness associate who is the owner of the intellectual property rights for thissoftware, or the BA that created the software. This is not intended to capture theidentifier for the BA who sold the software or the BA who purchased the software.
Column Comment.9: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.10: PREFERRED UNIT OF MEASUREMENT SYSTEM: whether this system has apreference for metric, imperial etc units of measure.
Column Comment.11: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.12: SHORT NAME: Common short name given to reference type or code.
Column Comment.13: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.14: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.15: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.16: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.17: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.18: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.19: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.20: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
